about_the_game:
Welcome to the wonderful mining world of Kun Kun Miner! Here, you will play a lovely alien miner from the planet Kun Kun - Kun Kun. Kun Kun is full of endless curiosity and yearning for the minerals on the earth, so it drives its mining spaceship full of science and technology, quietly landing to every corner of the earth, and launches a mining adventure full of laughter and challenges.
In the game, you need to control the kunkun to drive the ship to mine minerals, and dig enough minerals to enter the next level

However, in a tense mining action, Kun Kun was accidentally discovered by human beings, which triggered widespread concern and misunderstanding of human society. People began to speculate about Kun Kun's true intentions, and some even worried that it could threaten the safety of the Earth.

In the game, you need to help Kun Kun skillfully avoid the sight of humans, using Kun Kun's unique mining skills, such as basketball explosion, strange chicken feet, etc., to dig deep underground rare minerals. At the same time, you must always be alert to human interference and obstruction to ensure that Kun Kun can safely complete the mining task.

"Kun Kun Miner" is a kind of gold miner game, Kun Kun Miner has increased the story, let you take different kinds of minerals in different places around the world

Welcome to the wonderful mining world of Kun Kun Miner! Here, you will play a lovely alien miner from the planet Kun Kun - Kun Kun. Kun Kun is full of endless curiosity and yearning for the minerals on the earth, so it drives its mining spaceship full of science and technology, quietly landing to every corner of the earth, and launches a mining adventure full of laughter and challenges.

However, in a tense mining action, Kun Kun was accidentally discovered by human beings, which triggered widespread concern and misunderstanding of human society. People began to speculate about Kun Kun's true intentions, and some even worried that it could threaten the safety of the Earth.

In the game, you need to help Kun Kun skillfully avoid the sight of humans, using Kun Kun's unique mining skills, such as basketball explosion, strange chicken feet, etc., to dig deep underground rare minerals. name: KunKun miner

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10+(64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460, 2.70GHz or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: no
  • VR Support: no
  • Additional Notes: Intended for Low/Medium Graphics Settings (30-40 FPS at 1080p)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10+ (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 3770 3.4GHz or AMD equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 with 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: no
  • VR Support: no
  • Additional Notes: Intended for High/Ultra Graphics Settings (60-70 FPS at 1080p)

short_description: "Kun Kun Miner" is an innovative mining game. Players control alien miners from Kun Kun planet who land quietly on Earth seeking ores. Help Kun Kun avoid humans and use unique skills, like basketball explosion and chicken feet force, to dig for rare underground ores.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Vietnamese, Korean, Traditional Chinese
